languages.text: {n}Громко всхлипывая и рыдая, измазанная в крови девочка тормошит безжизненное тело Каса.{/n} "Папа... папочка... вставай! Я... я отдам наследство!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Громко всхлипывая и рыдая, измазанная в крови девочка тормошит безжизненное тело Каса.{/n} "Папа... папочка... вставай! Я... я отдам наследство!"

languages.text: {n}Sobbing and crying her eyes out, Adelia, smeared with her father's blood, is shaking Kas's lifeless body.{/n} "Dad... Daddy... get up! I'll... I'll give you the inheritance!"
languages.original_text: {n}Громко всхлипывая и рыдая, измазанная в крови девочка тормошит безжизненное тело Каса.{/n} "Папа... папочка... вставай! Я... я отдам наследство!"

{n}Sobbing and crying her eyes out, Adelia, smeared with her father's blood, is shaking Kas's lifeless body.{/n} "Dad... Daddy... get up! I'll... I'll give you the inheritance!"

languages.text: {n}泣き叫ぶアデリアは父親の血に塗れ、キャスの亡骸を揺さぶっている。{/n}「パパ…パパ…起きてよ！私が…私が遺産をあげるから！」
languages.original_text: {n}Sobbing and crying her eyes out, Adelia, smeared with her father's blood, is shaking Kas's lifeless body.{/n} "Dad... Daddy... get up! I'll... I'll give you the inheritance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}泣き叫ぶアデリアは父親の血に塗れ、キャスの亡骸を揺さぶっている。{/n}「パパ…パパ…起きてよ！私が…私が遺産をあげるから！」

languages.text: {n}阿德莉雅身上沾满了她父亲的鲜血。她哭得上气不接下气，使劲摇着卡斯毫无生气的尸体。{/n}“爸……爸爸……快起来！我……我把所有的遗产都给你！”
languages.original_text: {n}Sobbing and crying her eyes out, Adelia, smeared with her father's blood, is shaking Kas's lifeless body.{/n} "Dad... Daddy... get up! I'll... I'll give you the inheritance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿德莉雅身上沾满了她父亲的鲜血。她哭得上气不接下气，使劲摇着卡斯毫无生气的尸体。{/n}“爸……爸爸……快起来！我……我把所有的遗产都给你！”

languages.text: {n}Pleurant à chaudes larmes et recouverte du sang de son père, Adélia secoue le corps sans vie de Kas.{/n} « Papa... Papa, réveille-toi ! Je... je te donnerai l'héritage ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Sobbing and crying her eyes out, Adelia, smeared with her father's blood, is shaking Kas's lifeless body.{/n} "Dad... Daddy... get up! I'll... I'll give you the inheritance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pleurant à chaudes larmes et recouverte du sang de son père, Adélia secoue le corps sans vie de Kas.{/n} « Papa... Papa, réveille-toi ! Je... je te donnerai l'héritage ! »

languages.text: {n}Sollozando y desgañitándose, Adelia, cubierta de la sangre de su padre, sacude el cadáver de Kas.{/n} «Pa... Papá... ¡levántate! Te... ¡te daré la herencia!».
languages.original_text: {n}Sobbing and crying her eyes out, Adelia, smeared with her father's blood, is shaking Kas's lifeless body.{/n} "Dad... Daddy... get up! I'll... I'll give you the inheritance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sollozando y desgañitándose, Adelia, cubierta de la sangre de su padre, sacude el cadáver de Kas.{/n} «Pa... Papá... ¡levántate! Te... ¡te daré la herencia!».

languages.text: {n}Bitterlich weinend und mit dem Blut ihres Vaters beschmiert, schüttelt Adelia Kas leblosen Körper.{/n} "Vater ... Vater ... wacht auf! Ich ... Ich überlasse Euch das Erbe!"
languages.original_text: {n}Sobbing and crying her eyes out, Adelia, smeared with her father's blood, is shaking Kas's lifeless body.{/n} "Dad... Daddy... get up! I'll... I'll give you the inheritance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bitterlich weinend und mit dem Blut ihres Vaters beschmiert, schüttelt Adelia Kas leblosen Körper.{/n} "Vater ... Vater ... wacht auf! Ich ... Ich überlasse Euch das Erbe!"

languages.text: {n}Babasının kanına bulanmış, hıçkırarak ağlayan Adelia, Kas'ın cansız bedenini sarsıyor.{/n} "Baba... Babacığım... Uyan! Miras senin olsun!"
languages.original_text: {n}Sobbing and crying her eyes out, Adelia, smeared with her father's blood, is shaking Kas's lifeless body.{/n} "Dad... Daddy... get up! I'll... I'll give you the inheritance!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Babasının kanıyla kaplanmış ve hıçkırarak ağlayan Adelia, Kas'ın cansız bedenini sarsıyor.{/n} "Baba... Babacığım... Uyan! Miras senin olsun!"
